metadata.title: CVE-2020-28948 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Archive_Tar through 1.4.10 allows an unserialization attack because phar:is blocked but PHAR: is not blocked.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-pear - 1:1.10.1+submodules+notgz-6ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-pear package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.10.1+submodules+notgz-6ubuntu0.2').
drupal7 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
